edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer

Class TrainerScore

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.acoustic.tiedstate.trainer.TrainerScore

  • public class TrainerScore
extends Object
    Used to transfer data from the trainer to the acoustic model

      • setGamma

        public void setGamma()
        Computes the a posteriori probability. This is the product of the current alpha and beta, or the summation of the current logAlpha and logBeta. The current beta is updated in the object, and the current alpha and beta are used.

      • setScalingFactor

        public void setScalingFactor(float logScalingFactor)
